result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Final pre-trial on December 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:33 AM Defendant Jennifer L. Schoeppe in court.  Attorney Sara Kneevers appeared by video for Jennifer L. Schoeppe.  Prosecuting attorney Gregory A. Parker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Remarks by Atty. Kneevers regarding offer and counter offer.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.

1:47 PM Prosecuting attorney Gregory A. Parker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant JENNIFER L. SCHOEPPE in court.  Attorney Sara Kneevers in court for JENNIFER L. SCHOEPPE. Defense waives reading of the complaint and wishes to waive the preliminary hearing.  Waiver form provided to the Court.  Court advises party of her right, accepts waiver and binds over.  Information will mirror the complaint.

ARRAIGNMENT;  Enters NG to all counts.

Defense requests the no contact provision be lifted.  Court holds open pending verification of probation no contact was lifted.
Final pre-trial scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on September 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Joseph J. Kaupie in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant JENNIFER L. SCHOEPPE in court. Court orders defendant to report to the Public Defender's Office to see if they qualify for appointment of counsel. Atty. Kneevers has not been appointed yet.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

No contact with Micheal Michaelis directly or indirectly.    No contact with known drug users or dealers.    Absolute sobriety, no illegal drugs, only prescription medication with a valid prescription.  No entry into any Class B licensed establishments.  No travel outside the state without prior court approval.

01:18 PM Defendant JENNIFER L. SCHOEPPE in court.  Gregory A. Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Called the cases. Has Atty Kneevers on other cases.  Unsure if she was going to be here for appearance today or not.  Go off record for JA to call Attorney Kneevers.  Atty Kneevers not able to appear today.  
Case recalled 1:46 pm  Court reinstates her previous bonds in the older cases.  Sets bond in this case at:  $7500 signature bond with conditions.
